page.title: 02NATURE RESERVE
page.content: THIS IS AN IMPORTANT THOUGH IN THE USUAL SEASIDE SENSE TOTALLY UNDEVELOPED RECREATIONAL AREA. AN IMPORTANT ASPECT OF THIS IS THE NATURE RESERVE WHICH OCCUPIES MUCH OF THE DUNES ,BEACH AND MUDFLATS AND WHICH IS THE SUBJECT OF A SEPARATE ENTRY. WALKING, BIRD WATCHING,COCKLE DIGGING ,HORSE RIDING, WATCHING AIRCRAFT BOMBING AND STRAFFING PRACTICE TARGETS ON THE BEACH ARE ALL SIGNIFICANT ACTIVITIES. AT ODDS WITH THEM ALL AND IN FACT ILLEGAL IS MOTOR CYCLING ON THE DUNES. THE NOISE OF THE BIKES DISTURBS THE TRANQUILITY SOUGHT BY MOST OF THE OTHER USERS AND THEIR TYRES THREATEN TO DESTROY VEGETATION AND ALLOW THE WIND TO REMOVE THE SAND OF THE DUNES.THIS IS OF PARTICULAR CONCERN TO THE ANGLIA WATER AUTHORITY WHICH IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SEA DEFENCES.
